trans-unit.source: Prompts the user to select a location for saving a file.
trans-unit.target: 提示用户选择保存文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This class can either open and overwrite an existing file or create a new file.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以打开并覆盖现有文件或创建新的文件。

trans-unit.source: Most of the functionality for this class is found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog> class.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog>中找到大部分此类功能

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class.
This class is safe to instantiate in any security zone; appropriate permission demands are placed on the individual properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类是安全的任何安全区域; 在实例化适当的权限需求放置在单独的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box prompts the user for permission to create a file if the user specifies a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是否对话框，提示用户提供许可以创建一个文件，如果用户指定不存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dialog box prompts the user before creating a file if the user specifies a file name that does not exist; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the dialog box automatically creates the new file without prompting the user for permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对话框中创建文件，如果用户指定不存在; 的文件名称之前提示用户<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果对话框中自动创建新的文件而不提示用户提供许可。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Opens the file with read/write permission selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户选定的读/写权限打开文件。

trans-unit.source: The read/write file selected by the user.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save As" name="Save As" href=""></xref> dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that already exists.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_Save As" name="Save As" href=""></xref>如果用户指定已存在的文件名，对话框将显示一条警告。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dialog box prompts the user before overwriting an existing file if the user specifies a file name that already exists; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the dialog box automatically overwrites the existing file without prompting the user for permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果覆盖现有文件，如果用户指定的文件名称已存在; 之前，对话框中提示用户<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果对话框中自动将覆盖现有文件，而不提示用户提供许可。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets all dialog box options to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 将所有对话框选项重都置为其默认值。
